name: Epic Ball - Alpha
description:
A more modern approach to the classic Brick-Breaker game genre! This game includes more modern effects, a beautiful background, and five levels to break. The game is still in its alpha stage.

Features
- Buffs: Colored scrolls will either give you the Multiply or Explosion Ball buff!
- Debuffs: Black scrolls will either give you the Fast Ball or Small Paddle debuff!

How to play:
Move Paddle: Hold your finger on the paddle handle and swipe in any direction so that the paddle may follow.

Warning: The paddle cannot go over the border line!
